pinyin: mei2 ti3 fang3 wen4 kong4 zhi4

definition: medium/intermediary/matchmaker/go-between/abbr. for 媒體|媒体[mei2 ti3], media, esp. news media
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
